notes: 1. (12+3) awarded following completion of secondary school = completion of three years (XY semester credit hours) of undergraduate study of (LEVEL + SUBJECT) education
A/R = 12 years of elementary-secondary education
LOP = 3 years beyond completion of 12 years of elementary-secondary education
2. (12+2) awarded following a Proficiency Certificate in Education = associate's degree in (LEVEL/special) education with a concentration in (SUBJECT)
A/R = Proficiency Certificate in Education
LOP = 2 years beyond a Proficiency Certificate in Education
3. (2+1) awarded following a 2-year bachelor's degree = completion of one year (XY semester credit hours) of undergraduate study of (LEVEL + SUBJECT) education

LOP = 1 year beyond a 2-year bachelor's degree
4. (3+1) awarded following a 3-year bachelor's degree = bachelor's degree in (LEVEL/special) education with a concentration in (SUBJECT)

credentialName: Ttulo de Contador Privado
admissionRequirements: Completion of 6 years of elementary education
programLength: Varies
notes: A/R = Completion of 6 years of elementary education
LOP = Varies
POS = field of study
EQUIVALAENCY: Ttulo de Contador/a Privado/a =
if 2 or 3 years in length = Completion of 8th OR 9th grade at an accredited vocational senior high school (depending on the program length)
If shorter = Completion of secondary level technical training

This program is part of commercial training. Programs of commercial study vary in length from a few months to four years; however, most last three years. Programs are offered at the lower-secondary level, referred to in Mexico as: nivel medio basico, nivel medio elemental or nivel medio terminal, and generally lead to one of the following diplomas:
auxiliar contable (bookkeeping assistant),
contadoradministrativo (administrative bookkeeper),
contador privado (private bookkeeper),
estenografo (stenographer)
secretaria (secretary)
secretaria administrative (administrative secretary)
secretaria bilingue (bilingual secretary), and
secretaria ejecutiva (executive secretary)"

credentialName: Carta de Pasante
notes: PLEASE LOOK CLOSELY AT THE DOCUMENTS
FOR SECONDARY STUDY: Carta de Pasante = senior high school diploma or vocational senior high school diploma (review coursework)
LOP = 11 or 12 years of elementary-secondary education
POS = field of study
FOR UNDERGRADUATE STUDY: Carta de Pasante = X years/semesters/semester credit hours of undergraduate study
A/R = secondary school completion
LOP = 4-6 years beyond completion of elementary-secondary education
FOR GRADUATE STUDY: Carta de Pasante = X years/semesters/semester credit hours of graduate study
A/R = Ttulo de Licenciado or a qualifying first degree
LOP = 2 years beyond a qualifying first degree
At undergraduate and graduate level, Cartas de Pasante are issued upon completion of required coursework, but before qualifying for the award. A Carta de Pasanta does not denote degree award.

credentialName: Ttulo de Licenciada en Enfermeria
programLength: 4 years/8 semesters beyond completion of elementary-secondary education
notes: I., Ttulo de Licenciado/a en Enfermera (Title of Licentiate in Nursing) = Bachelor of Science in Nursing
A/R = secondary school completion
LOP = 4 years/8 semesters beyond completion of elementary-secondary education
HOWEVER, variations in the pathways to earn this credential exist:
II., Institutions may offer shortened programs to holders of an upper-secondary level Ttulo de Enfermera with professional experience
-- EQUIVALENCY: Bachelor of Science in Nursing
-- CREDITS: commensurate with the LOP (15/term/semester)

-- NOTE (delete or modify info in parenthesis depending on whether we have docs for the Ttulo de Enfermera): This credential was designed for holders of vocational upper-secondary credentials in nursing with professional experience (see Ttulo de Enfermera in credential I above); it entitles the holder to the same academic and professional rights as holders of an eight-term Ttulo de Licenciado.
-- LOP (adjust as is appropriate, some programs are 4 semesters, or other): Three 4-month terms beyond a Ttulo de Enfermera
III., Institutions may also offer 3-year programs to holders of an academic secondary credential (Bacchillerato/Prparatoria)
-- EQUIVALENCY: Bachelor of Science in Nursing
-- CREDITS: commensurate with the LOP (15/term/semester)
-- NOTE: This credential entitles the holder to the same academic and professional rights as holders of an eight-term Ttulo de Licenciado.
-- LOP (adjust as is appropriate): 3 years beyond completion of elementary-secondary education
SAMPLES (945688):
2017 entry:
- Ttulo de Enfermera +1 year (3 terms)
- Bachillerato + 2 years + 8 months + 1 year servicio social
2022 entry:
- Ttulo de Enfermera + three 4-month terms
- Bachillerato + eight 4-month terms
2020 entry:
- Ttulo de Enfermera +2 years
SAMPLES (1100366)
2017 entry:
- Ttulo de Enfermera +3 years
Same school offers both a Ttulo de Enfermera + 2 years and 3 years"

credentialName: Grading scale is based on 0 - 10 with 6.0 as the minimum passing grade:  9.0 - 10 = 4.00/A, 8.0 - 8.9 = 3.33/B+, 7.0 - 7.9 = 2.67/B-, 6.0 - 6.9 = 2.00/C, 0.0 - 5.9 = 0.00/F
Grading scale is based on 0.0 - 10 with 7.0 as the minimum passing grade:  9.0 - 10 = 4.00/A, 8.0 - 8.9 = 3.00/B, 7.0 - 7.9 = 2.00/C, 0.0 - 6.9 = 0.00/F
Grading scale is based on 0 - 10 with 8 as the minimum passing grade:  10 = 4.00/A, 9 = 3.00/B, 8 = 2.00/C, 0 - 7 = 0.00/F
Grading scale is based on 0 - 100 with 60 as the minimum passing grade: 90 - 100 = 4.00/A, 80 - 89 = 3.33/B+, 70 - 79 = 2.67/B-, 60 - 69 = 2.00/C, 0 - 59 = 0.00/F
Grading scale is based on 0 - 100 with 70 as the minimum passing grade:  90 - 100 = 4.00/A, 80 - 89 = 3.00/B, 70 - 79 = 2.00/C, 0 - 69 = 0.00/F
The grade scale is based on 100 with 80 as the minimum passing grade: 95 - 100 = 4.00/A, 90 - 94 = 3.33/B+, 85 - 89 = 3.00/B, 80 - 84 = 2.00/C, 10-79 = 0.00/F

The grades are converted as follow: 10 (excelente / excellent) = 4.00/A, 9 (muy bien / very good) = 4.00/A,  8 (bien / good) = 3.33/B+, 7 (regular) = 2.67/B-, 6 (suficiente / sufficient) = 2.00/C, and below 6 (no suficiente / insufficient) = 0.00/F.

credentialName: CONALEP
programLength: five- to six-semester
notes: CONALEP refers to the Colegio Nacional de Educacin Profesional Tcnica / National School of Professional Technical Education which was established in Mxico in 1978 by Presidential Decree.

The goal of CONALEP is to enable upper-secondary level students to acquire the vocational skills needed for direct entry in the employment sector rather than to prepare them for higher education; accordingly, CONALEP is able to adjust institutional curriculum to fit local business and industry.

Students complete a five- to six-semester program of study, with approximately 60% devoted to hands-on activities, leading to the upper-secondary qualification of profesional tcnico / technical professional which in Mexico belongs to the nivel medio superior / upper-secondary level.
The academic requirement for admission into CONALEP programs is Mexican secundaria or lower-secondary education, that is, to the seventh, eighth, and ninth grades.

There are 16 campuses: Cd. Chihuahua, Cd. Jurez, Monterrey, Saltillo, Torren, Tampico, Reynosa, San Luis Potos, Culiacn, Tijuana, Cd. del Carmen, Mazatln, Quertaro, Mrida, Villa Hermosa, and Campeche.
The grade scale is based on 5 to10 with 6 as passing:  9-10 = 4.00 / A, 8 = 3.33 / B +, 7 = 2.67 / B-, 6 = 2.00 / C, 5.9-0 = 0.00 / F.
The academic year is comprised of tetramestres / 4-month terms; transfer policies are liberal.

Universidad Interamericana del Norte, Campus Mazatln, Sinaloa, holds Reconocimiento de Validez Oficial de Estudios / Legal Standing through the Secretara de Educacin Pblica y Cultura / Secretariat of Public Education and Culture of Sinaloa State, agreement No. RVOE-001-98, dated11-10-98.

Escuela Superior de Danza Folklrica Mexicana, AC
englishName: (Higher School of Mexican Folkloric Dance, A.C.)
notes: Escuela Superior de Danza Folklrica Mexicana / Higher School of Mexican Folkloric Dance, located in Chihuahua City, Chihuahua State, is a private institution founded in 1960 to promote Mexican regional dance.
The ESDFM offers three programs, two of which are academic.

At the undergraduate level, the eight-semester Licenciatura en Danza Folklrica Mexicana / Licentiate in Mexican Folkloric Dance holds Reconocimiento de Validez Oficial de Estudios / Official Recognition by means of Secretara de Educacin Pblica / Secretariat of Public Education agreement number 21MSU1116I of 1999; admission to the licentiate program requires prior completion of bachillerato / upper-secondary education.

At the upper-secondary level, the five-summer Ttulo de Tcnico Profesional Folklorista en Danza / Title of Professional Folkloric Technician in Dance likewise holds Reconocimiento de Validez Oficial de Estudios / Official Recognition by means of Secretara de Educacin Pblica / Secretariat of Public Education agreement; admission to the technician program requires prior completion of secundaria / lower-secondary education.

Completion of both programs culminates in a carta de pasante / attestation of completion of study plan; upon passing the examen recepcional / graduation examination, the student is issued his ttulo de tcnico (at the upper-secondary level) or ttulo de licenciado (at the undergraduate level), both of which qualify for a cdula / degree registration card which functions in Mexico as licensure at the corresponding educational level.
In addition to its two academic programs, the ESDFM offers the Curso de Actualizacin / Updating Program, one month in length, four hours per day.
The Curso de Actualizacin is a skills-based program which provides enrichment / further education in Mexican Folkloric Dance.
Admission does not require a specific Mexican benchmark credential; accordingly, the Curso de Actualizacin equates to non-credit bearing continuing education in the U.S.

credentialName: Universidad Interamericana del Norte
notes: The Inter-American University of the North (full name is Universidad Interamericana del Norte y Tecnolgico Sierra Madre / Inter-American University of the North and Sierra Madre Technological Institute) is a multicampus university system across Mexico.

The UIN system offers preparatoria / upper-secondary, licenciatura / licentiate, maestra / master's and doctorado / doctorate degree programs in such fields as ciencias naturales y exactas / exact and natural sciences, educacin y humanidades / humanities and teacher training, ciencias agropecuarias / land and cattle sciences, ciencias de la salud / health sciences, ingenieras / engineering, ciencias sociales / social sciences, and ciencias administrativas / administrative sciences.

There are 16 campuses: Cd. Chihuahua, Cd. Jurez, Monterrey, Saltillo, Torren, Tampico, Reynosa, San Luis Potos, Culiacn, Tijuana, Cd. del Carmen, Mazatln, Quertaro, Mrida, Villa Hermosa, and Campeche.
The academic year is comprised of tetramestres / 4-month terms; transfer policies are liberal.
gradingInfo: The grade scale is based on 5 to10 with 6 as passing:  9-10 = 4.00 / A, 8 = 3.33 / B +, 7 = 2.67 / B-, 6 = 2.00 / C, 5.9-0 = 0.00 / F.

credentialName: Universidad Pedaggica Nacional, Unidad 81, Chihuahua
notes: The multicampus National Pedagogical University, headquartered in Mexico City, was founded in 1978 by presidential decree to offer university level training to working elementary and early-childhood teachers trained in normal schools.
Attendance is generally semi-escolarizada / open or non-traditional in the sistema de educacin a distancia / distance education system.

The plan de estudios / degree plan governs the curriculum which is three phased at the licentiate level:  formacin inicial / basic studies (equivalent to two semesters), formacin profesional / professional studies  (equivalent to four semesters), and concentracin / concentracin (equivalent to two semesters).
UPN also offers graduate education.

credentialName: Universidad Interamericana del Norte, Campus Saltillo
notes: The Inter-American University of the North (full name is Universidad Interamericana del Norte y Tecnolgico Sierra Madre / Inter-American University of the North and Sierra Madre Technological Institute) is a multicampus university system across Mexico.

The UIN system offers preparatoria / upper-secondary, licenciatura / licentiate, maestra / master's and doctorado / doctorate degree programs in such fields as ciencias naturales y exactas / exact and natural sciences, educacin y humanidades / humanities and teacher training, ciencias agropecuarias / land and cattle sciences, ciencias de la salud / health sciences, ingenieras / engineering, ciencias sociales / social sciences, and ciencias administrativas / administrative sciences.

There are 16 campuses: Cd. Chihuahua, Cd. Jurez, Monterrey, Saltillo, Torren, Tampico, Reynosa, San Luis Potos, Culiacn, Tijuana, Cd. del Carmen, Mazatln, Quertaro, Mrida, Villa Hermosa, and Campeche.
The grade scale is based on 5 to10 with 6 as passing:  9-10 = 4.00 / A, 8 = 3.33 / B +, 7 = 2.67 / B-, 6 = 2.00 / C, 5.9-0 = 0.00 / F.
The academic year is comprised of tetramestres / 4-month terms; transfer policies are liberal.

credentialName: Universidad Pedaggica Nacional
notes: The multicampus National Pedagogical University, headquartered in Mexico City, was founded in 1978 by presidential decree to offer university level training to working elementary and early-childhood teachers trained in normal schools.
Attendance is generally semi-escolarizada / open or non-traditional in the sistema de educacin a distancia / distance education system.

The plan de estudios / degree plan governs the curriculum which is three phased at the licentiate level:  formacin inicial / basic studies (equivalent to two semesters), formacin profesional / professional studies  (equivalent to four semesters), and concentracin / concentracin (equivalent to two semesters).
UPN also offers graduate education.

programLength: five- to six-semester
notes: CONALEP refers to the Colegio Nacional de Educacin Profesional Tcnica / National School of Professional Technical Education which was established in Mxico in 1978 by Presidential Decree.

The goal of CONALEP is to enable upper-secondary level students to acquire the vocational skills needed for direct entry in the employment sector rather than to prepare them for higher education; accordingly, CONALEP is able to adjust institutional curriculum to fit local business and industry.

Students complete a five- to six-semester program of study, with approximately 60% devoted to hands-on activities, leading to the upper-secondary qualification of profesional tcnico / technical professional which in Mexico belongs to the nivel medio superior / upper-secondary level.
The academic requirement for admission into CONALEP programs is Mexican secundaria or lower-secondary education, that is, to the seventh, eighth, and ninth grades.

credentialName: Conservatorio Nacional de Msica
admissionRequirements: prior completion of educacin primaria / elementary education, plus an entrance examination
notes: Launched by Father Agustn Caballero in 1866 as the Conservatorio de Msica de la Sociedad Filarmnica Mexicana / Music Conservatory of the Mexican Philharmonic Society, the current Conservatorio Nacional de Msica de Mxico / National Music Conservatory of Mexico is the principal provider of training in performing arts.
Thus, the CNMM has the unique role of preserving Mexican national culture within the context of performing arts.

The CNMM has given rise to such entities as the the Escuela Nacional de Msica de la Universidad Nacional Autnoma de Mxico / National Music School of the National Autonomous University of Mexico as well as the Escuela Nacional de Arte Teatral / the National School of Theater Arts and the Orquesta Sinfnica Nacional / National Symphonic Orchestra, both of the Instituto Nacional de Bellas Artes / National Institute for Fine Arts.

In the areas of musical interpretation, teaching, creativity, and research, the conservatory currently offers three levels of skills-based study:  Nivel de iniciacin o sector infantil / introductory level or early-childhood section, tcnico profesional / professional technician, and (tcnico) superior / higher technician.

credentialName: Escuela DIF de Enfermera, A.C.
admissionRequirements: upper-secondary Ttulo de Enfermero / Title of Nurse and upper-secondary bachillerato
programLength: 3-term
issuingBody: Instituto Politcnico Nacional / National Polytechnic Institute of Mexico
notes: Escuela DIF (Desarrollo Integral de Familia) de Enfermera, A.C. / Integrated Family Development School of Nursing, located in Monterrey, Nuevo Len, is a private tertiary institution with Reconocimiento de Validez Oficial de Estudios / Legal Standing through the Instituto Politcnico Nacional / National Polytechnic Institute of Mexico, located in Mexico City, by means of Agreement Number 066/97, signed on 5-30-97 and published on 6-15-97.

Escuela DIF de Enfermera offers what in Mexico is usually called a curso complementario / complementary program for the Licenciatura de Enfermera / Licentiate in Nursing which is based on an IPN-approved degree plan.

This program is available to bearers of the upper-secondary Ttulo de Enfermero / Title of Nurse (and similary-named upper-secondary credentials in nursing) who subsequently complete the upper-secondary bachillerato.

The premise of this program is that the acquisition of the upper-secondary bachillerato affords EDIFE the opportunity to recognize upper-secondary Ttulo de Enfermero coursework as lower-level post-secondary coursework.

Accordingly, the bearer of the upper-secondary Ttulo de Enfermero who subsequently completes the upper-secondary bachillerato may enroll in a short (3-term) curso complementario / complementary program leading to the Licenciatura en Enfermera / Licentiate in Nursing which normally requires 8 semesters of study beyond completion of upper-secondary education.
Upon earning this licentiate, the nursing graduate qualifies for the cdula / degree registration card which constitutes professional licensing in Mexico.
Thus, the Licenciatura en Enfermera equates to a U.S. Bachelor of Science in Nursing even though it yields some 45 semester credit hours.

admissionRequirements: prior completion of the basic course of study in theology or two years of study in a Theological Institute
notes: The Higher Institute of Ecclesiatic Studies, founded in 1967, is a bona fide private institution of post-secondary education linked to the Universidad Pontificia de Mexico / Pontifical University of Mexico.
Universidad Pontificia de Mxico / Pontifical University of Mexico was founded in 1551 as the Pontifica y Real Universidad de Mxico.
The first institutional phase lasted until 1867.
The second phase ran from 1869 to 1932.

The third phase began 6-29-1982 when the Sagrada Congregacin para la Educacin Catlica / Sacred Congregation for Catholic Education created the Facultad de Teologa / Faculty of Theology; said faculty was recognized by the Secretariat of Public Education on 2-19-98 by means of agreement 982027 and was authorized to confer the degree of Licenciatura en Teologa / Licentiate in Theology.
UPM is recognized as a pontifical university by the Vatican.
AT UPM, the Diplomados Especializados (Teologa Espiritual) / Specialized Diploma Programs in Spiritual Theology require three summers of 80 clock hours per summer.
Admission requires prior completion of the basic course of study in theology or two years of study in a Theological Institute.
Aside from immigration requirements, foreign students require approval of the general or area coordinator.
UPM cursos de verano / summer programs do not count toward degrees in the regular programs of study.

programLength: 12 months

Institutional materials indicate that ITAM was the first school in Latin America to be accredited by AACSB International.

ITAM offers four MBA programs:  (1) Maestra en Administracin (MBA Full Time), lasting 12 months and requiring a minimum of 2 years of professional experience; (2) Maestra en Administracin (MBA Part Time), lasting 24 months and requiring a minimum of 3 years of professional experience; (3) Maestra en Direccin Internacional (Master in International Management), lasting 24 months (part-time) and requiring a minimum of 3 years of professional experience; (4) and Executive MBA Maestra en Direccin de Empresas (Master in Business Management), lasting 24 months (part-time on alternating Fridays and Saturdays) and requiring a minimum of 7 years of professional experience.
The grade scale at the graduate level is based on 10 with 6 as passing: :  9-10 = 4.00 / A, 8-8.9 = 3.33 / B+, 7-7.9 = 2.67 / B-, 6-6.9 = 2.00 / C, 5.9-0 = 0.00 / F.

International Baccalaureate Organization
notes: According to its website, the International Baccalaureate Organization is a non-profit educational organization established in 1968.
The IBO has four regional offices:  IB North America (IBNA), New York; IB Latin America (IBLA), Buenos Aires; IB Africa, Europe and Middle East (IBAEM), Geneva; and IB Asia-Pacific (IBAP), Singapore.

The IBO offers three international programs:  Diploma Programme for students in the final two years of school before university; Middle Years Programme for students aged 11 to 16;  and Primary Years Programme for students aged 3 to 12.

Participating institutions are provided with detailed curriculum guidelines for each program and subject area; teacher training workshops; online access to education resources, subject area experts, and discussion sessions with teachers at IB schools throughout the world; external assessment of DP students' work; and procedures for school-based (internal) assessment of student work.
The Diploma Programme (DP)--a comprehensive two-year curriculum available in English, French and Spanish--provides a rigorous pre-university course culminating in examinations.
Many countries have a national policy regarding the acceptance / recognition of the IB diploma.
A list of U.S. institutions awarding advanced placement credit for qualifying examinations is posted on the IBO website.

Grading is based on a seven-point scale, with 1 and 2  as unacceptable; 3 as mediocre and generally not accepted in the U.S.; 4 as satisfactory and sometimes accepted in the U.S.; 5 as good and more widely accepted in the U.S.; and 6 and 7 as very good and excellent respectively and accepted at virtually all U.S. institutions which recognize IBO examinations.

Seminario Hispano de Santa Maria de Guadalupe
englishName: (Hispanic Seminary of Santa Maria of Guadalupe)
notes: Founded in 1999, the Seminario Hispano de Santa Maria de Guadalupe was a new initiative of the Cardinal Archbishop of Mexico City -- undertaken with the support of the Pontifical University of Mexico and the Seminario Conciliar (major seminary) of Mexico -- to educate Hispanic men living in the U.S. and Canada for priestly service.

This minor seminary was formed to respond to the needs of men currently living in the United States and Canada who -- though excellent candidates for the priesthood -- find themselves, because of language and differences in educational systems, at a disadvantage in attempting to enter North American seminaries.
They receive language training and an academic curriculum that prepares them to transition into major seminaries in the U.S. and Canada.

credentialName: Sociedad Mexicana de Anlisis Existencial y Logoterapia, S.C.
englishName: (Mexican Existential Analysis and Speech Therapy Society)
notes: Founded in 1988, the Sociedad Mexicana de Anlisis Existencial y Logoterapia / Mexican Society for Logotherapy and Existential Analysis is the first such institution in Mexico.
Logotherapy and Existential Analysis constitute the so-called  'Third Viennese School of Psychotherapy', was developed by Viktor Frankl and first published in 1938.
Logotherapy is defined as the method of psychotherapeutical treatment based on spiritual rather than psychological dimension.
The goal is to lead a person to self-determination based on self-responsibility.
According to the Viktor Frankl Institute website, logotherapy is the search for meaning as the primary human motivation.
Since persons are capable of deciding, they are also responsible for their decisions.
A human being is not a mere puppet of biological, hereditary and environmental forces but is always free to take a stand toward inner conditions and outer circumstances.

notes: The University of the Americas, Inc., was founded as Mexico City College in 1940.

It became a degree-granting institution in 1945, was renamed the University of the Americas in 1963, moved to Cholula (Puebla) in 1968, and changed its name to the the Fundacin Universidad de las Amricas-Puebla / University of the Americas at Puebla Foundation in 1985 at which time a campus at Mexico City was re-established.
Both campuses are accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools, Fundacin Universidad de las Amricas-Puebla in 1959 and Universidad de las Amricas-Mxico in 1991.
Today, these are considered separate institutions.
UDLA-Mexico City is a bilingual (English and Spanish) institution.
Grade scales:
1.   Undergraduate:  Based on 10 with 6 as passing 9-10 = 4.00/A, 8-8.89 = 3.33/B+, 7-7.9 = 2.67/B-, 6-6.9 = 2.00/C, and below 6 = 0.00/F; when 5-5.9 is treated as a pass, it equates to 1.00/D.
Graduate:  Based on 10 with 7 as passing:  9-10 = 4.00/A, 8-8.9 = 3.00/B, 7-7.9 = 2.00/C, and below 7 = 0.00/F.
2.  Undergraduate: Based on 10 with 7 as passing: 9-10 = 4.00/A, 8-8.9 = 3.00/B, 7-7.9 = 2.00/C, below 7 = 0.00/F.
Graduate programs consider a grade of 8 as passing.

notes: UNAM-CELE - The Special Commission for Foreign Languages, teaching certificates are valid only to determine the qualification for the teaching of a foreign language at a secondary or tertiary level, exclusively within the UNAM campuses.

credentialName: Universidad Pedaggica Nacional Unidad No. 94 Centro
notes: The multicampus National Pedagogical University, headquartered in Mexico City, was founded in 1978 by presidential decree to offer university level training to working elementary and early-childhood teachers trained in normal schools.
Attendance is generally semi-escolarizada / open or non-traditional in the sistema de educacin a distancia / distance education system.

The plan de estudios / degree plan governs the curriculum which is three phased at the licentiate level:  formacin inicial / basic studies (equivalent to two semesters), formacin profesional / professional studies  (equivalent to four semesters), and concentracin / concentracin (equivalent to two semesters).
UPN also offers graduate education.

credentialName: Universidad Pontificia de Mxico
notes: Universidad Pontificia de Mxico / Pontifical University of Mexico was founded in 1551 as the Pontifica y Real Universidad de Mxico.
The first institutional phase lasted until 1867.
The second phase ran from 1869 to 1932.

The third phase began 6-29-1982 when the Sagrada Congregacin para la Educacin Catlica / Sacred Congregation for Catholic Education created the Facultad de Teologa / Faculty of Theology; said faculty was recognized by the Secretariat of Public Education on 2-19-98 by means of agreement 982027 and was authorized to confer the degree of Licenciatura en Teologa / Licentiate in Theology.
UPM is recognized as a pontifical university by the Vatican.

credentialName: Universidad Pontificia de Mxico, Special Programs
admissionRequirements: prior completion of the basic course of study in theology or two years of study in a Theological Institute
notes: Universidad Pontificia de Mxico / Pontifical University of Mexico was founded in 1551 as the Pontifica y Real Universidad de Mxico.
The first institutional phase lasted until 1867.
The second phase ran from 1869 to 1932.

The third phase began 6-29-1982 when the Sagrada Congregacin para la Educacin Catlica / Sacred Congregation for Catholic Education created the Facultad de Teologa / Faculty of Theology; said faculty was recognized by the Secretariat of Public Education on 2-19-98 by means of agreement 982027 and was authorized to confer the degree of Licenciatura en Teologa / Licentiate in Theology.
UPM is recognized as a pontifical university by the Vatican.
AT UPM, the Diplomados Especializados (Teologa Espiritual) / Specialized Diploma Programs in Spiritual Theology require three summers of 80 clock hours per summer.
Admission requires prior completion of the basic course of study in theology or two years of study in a Theological Institute.
Aside from immigration requirements, foreign students require approval of the general or area coordinator.
UPM cursos de verano / summer programs do not count toward degrees in the regular programs of study.

credentialName: Seminario Diocesano de la Inmaculada Concepcin
notes: Immaculate Conception Diocese Seminary was founded in 1974.
The Seminary is recognized as a religious institution for its theological studies but is not granted academic accreditation by the Public Education Secretariat in Mexico.

On 4-22-08, SpanTran spoke to Ms. Luca Pintor / Academic Secretary, who stated the following:  The Seminary offers upper-secondary and tertiary education for philosophy, both with study plans and degrees accredited by the Secretara de Educacin Pblica / Public Education Secretariat; the Seminary also offers theology studies, which are not accredited by said Mexican Secretariat.
Ms. Pintor further stated that the current rector requests a Mexican licenciatura / licentiate in philosophy for admission to the theological studies program.
Rather than academic decision, based on policies of enrollment services, the admission  requirements are decided by the prevailing rector.

credentialName: Centro de Enseanza Tcnica Industrial 7
notes: Created in 1966, the Centro Regional de Enseanza Tcnica Industrial (CeRETI), Guadalajara, Jalisco State, began offering technical education, leading to the designation of tcnico / technician (in construction, electrical engineering, electronics, and mechanics) based on a UNESCO educational model.
In 1971, the Tcnico Laboratorista Qumico en Celulosa y Papel / Chemical Laborabory Technician in Paper and Cellulose was added.
In 1977-76, the term Tcnico / Technician was changed to Tecnlogo / Technologist, distinguishing between general secondary and upper-secondary education.
In 1978, tertiary level degrees in industrial engineering were added with majors in instrumentation and process control, mechanics, and paper and pulp.

In 1983, the CeNETI CeRETI system was dissolved; the former center in Jalisco became the Centro de Enseanza Tcnica Industrial (CETI) ./ Center for Industrial Technical Education as an Organismo Pblico Descentralizado Federal / Decentralized Public Federal Institution.

credentialName: Universidad Autnoma de Guadalajara
notes: Founded in 1935, the Autonomous University of Guadalajara in Jalisco State is the oldest private university in Mexico.
Previously, it derived its validez oficial / accreditation through UNAM, the National Autonomous University of Mexico; currently, it is accredited through the Secretariat of Public Education.

credentialName: Universidad Autnoma de Guadalajara (Diplomado)
programLength: three years
notes: Founded in 1935, the Autonomous University of Guadalajara in Jalisco State is the oldest private university in Mexico.
Previously, it derived its validez oficial / accreditation through UNAM, the National Autonomous University of Mexico; currently, it is accredited through the Secretariat of Public Education.
UAG offered a flexible two-stage program in language teaching and linguistics.

The first stage comprised the Diplomado en la Enseanza de Idiomas / Diplomate in the Teaching of Languages program which required three years of full-time study; the second stage comprised the Maestra en Lingstica / Title of Master in Linguistics which required one year.
UAG has confirmed to SpanTran Educational Services, Inc.,  that this combined program achieves the equivalent of a licenciatura / licentiate in Mexico.

credentialName: Universidad Autnoma de Guadalajara (Medical Students)
notes: Founded in 1935, the Autonomous University of Guadalajara in Jalisco State is the oldest private university in Mexico.
Previously, it derived its validez oficial / accreditation through UNAM, the National Autonomous University of Mexico; currently, it is accredited through the Secretariat of Public Education.
In addition to its medical program for Mexican nationals, UAG offers a special medical program for foreigners, with the first 4 semesters in English and the remaining 4 in Spanish.
In order to graduate, the medical student, whether Mexican or foreign, must serve his servicio social / community service and must pass his examen profesional / degree examination.

Mexican citizens are issued a cdula / degree registration card once their degrees are registered with the Secretara de Educacin Pblica / Secretariat of Public Education; non-Mexican residents are not issued a cdula without which they cannot practice medicine.

credentialName: Universidad Cristiana de las Amricas
notes: Documentation from Universidad Cristiana de las Amricas / Christian University of the Americas, located in Ciudad Guadalupe, Nuevo Len State, Mexico, indicates that the institution holds Reconocimiento de Validez Oficial de Estudios / Recognition of Official Validity of Studies through Northland Baptist College in Wisconsin.
According to the Council for Higher Education Accreditation / CHEA, Northland Baptist College is not the name of any accredited institution in the United States.
CHEA indicates that Northland Baptist Bible College, located in Dunbar, Wisconsin, is accredited by the Transnational Association of Christian Colleges and Schools.

Although TRACS is a bona fide accreditor, recognized by both CHEA and the U.S. Department of Education, it is not one of the six U.S. regional accreditors and does not replace the North Central Association of Colleges and Schools which is the regional accreditor for Wisconsin institutions.

Recognition by or an articulation with an individual institution in the United States in no way equates to Reconocimiento de Validez Oficial de Estudios in Mexico nor does it imply regional accreditation in the U.S.
It is therefore the judgment of SpanTran Educational Services, Inc., that Universidad Cristiana de las Amricas lacks accreditation in both Mexico and the United States.

issuingBody: Southern Association of Colleges and Schools
notes: Accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools since 1959, see under Fundacin Universidad de las Amricas-Puebla in https://sacscoc.org/app/uploads/2019/11/Institutionswebmemlist.pdf

The RVOE in Mexico for certain programs was revoked (the inst didnt seek renewal, most likely because of other recognitions) https://www.sirvoes.sep.gob.mx/sirvoes/mvc/consultas# https://www.udlap.mx/ofertaacademica/mapaoferta.aspx
The University of the Americas, Inc., was founded as Mexico City College in 1940

It became a degree-granting institution in 1945, was renamed the University of the Americas in 1963, moved to Cholula (Puebla) in 1968, and changed its name to the the Fundacin Universidad de las Amricas-Puebla / University of the Americas at Puebla Foundation in 1985 at which time a campus at Mexico City was re-established
Both campuses are accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools, Fundacin Universidad de las Amricas-Puebla in 1959 and Universidad de las Amricas-Mxico in 1991
Today, these are considered separate institutions
Founded as an English-speaking institution, today at the University of the Americas in Puebla, Spanish is the predominant language
gradingInfo: Until 1977, the University of the Americas followed the quarter rather than semester system and the grade scale was based on the letter grades of A to F. Since Fall, 1977, the grading scale has been 0-10, with 7.5 as the minimum passing grade; in Fall, 1986, this grade scale was matched to Mexican alphabetic equivalencies, continuing with 7.5 / suficiente (sufficient) as the minimum passing grade. Grade conversions: 9-10 = 4.00 / A, 8-8.9 = 3.00 / B, 7.5-7.9 = 2.00 / C, below 7.5 = 0.00 / F

Instituto de Ciencias y Estudios Superiores de Tamaulipas - Nursing
englishName: (Sciences and Higher Studies Institute of Tamaulipas - Nursing)
admissionRequirements: completion of upper-secondary education (Bachillerato) and upper-secondary Ttulo de Enfermero
programLength: 3-term Curso Complementario
notes: Founded in 1979, the Institute of Sciences and Higher Studies of Tamaulipas / ICEST is a private institution with validez oficial / accreditation through the State of Tamaulipas
ICEST offers a special program called Curso Complementario de Licenciatura en Enfermera / Complementary Program for the Licentiate in Nursing

This program is available to bearers of the upper-secondary Ttulo de Enfermero / Title of Nurse who also complete Bachillerato / Upper-Secondary Education or the dual Bachillerato Tecnolgico en el rea de Ciencias Qumico-Biolgicas en la carrera Enfermera General / Upper-Secondary Education, Biology and Chemistry Stream, with emphasis on General Nursing

The premise of this program is that the acquisition of the upper-secondary bachillerato affords ICEST the opportunity to recognize upper-secondary Ttulo de Enfermero coursework as lower-level post-secondary coursework

Accordingly, the bearer of the upper-secondary Ttulo de Enfermero may enroll in a short (3-term) Curso Complementario / Complementary Program leading to the Licenciatura en Enfermera / Licentiate in Nursing which normally requires 8 semesters of study beyond completion of upper-secondary education
Upon earning this licentiate, the nursing graduate qualifies for the cdula / degree registration card which constitutes professional licensing in Mexico
Thus, the Licenciatura en Enfermera equates to a U.S. Bachelor of Science in Nursing even though it yields some 45 semester credit hours
gradingInfo: The undergraduate grade scale is based on 10 with 6 as passing: 9-10 = 4.00/A, 8-8.9 = 3.33/B+, 7-7.9 = 2.67/B-, 6-6.9 = 2.00/C, 5.9-0 = 0.00 / F. The graduate grade scale is based on 10 with 8 as minimum acceptable grade: 9-10 = 4.00/A, 8-8.9 = 3.00/B.

notes: The multicampus National Pedaggical University, headquartered in Mxico City, was founded in 1978 by presidential decree to offer university level training to working elementary and early-childhood teachers trained in normal schools
Attendance is generally semi-escolarizada / open or non-traditional in the sistema de educacin a distancia / distance education system

The plan de estudios / degree plan governs the curriculum which is three phased at the licentiate level: formacin inicial / basic studies (equivalent to two semesters), formacin profesional / professional studies (equivalent to four semesters), and concentracin / concentracin (equivalent to two semesters)
UPN also offers graduate education

credentialName: Universidad Interamericana del Norte, Campus Mrida
englishName: (Inter-American University of the North, Merida Campus)
notes: The Inter-American University of the North (full name is Universidad Interamericana del Norte y Tecnolgico Sierra Madre / Inter-American University of the North and Sierra Madre Technological Institute) is a multicampus university system across Mexico

The UIN system offers preparatoria / upper-secondary, licenciatura / licentiate, maestra / master's and doctorado / doctorate degree programs in such fields as ciencias naturales y exactas / exact and natural sciences, educacin y humanidades / humanities and teacher training, ciencias agropecuarias / land and cattle sciences, ciencias de la salud / health sciences, ingenieras / engineering, ciencias sociales / social sciences, and ciencias administrativas / administrative sciences
There are 16 campuses: Cd. Chihuahua, Cd. Jurez, Monterrey, Saltillo, Torren, Tampico, Reynosa, San Luis Potos, Culiacn, Tijuana, Cd. del Carmen, Mazatln, Quertaro, Mrida, Villa Hermosa, and Campeche
The grade scale is based on 5 to10 with 6 as passing: 9-10 = 4.00 / A, 8 = 3.33 / B +, 7 = 2.67 / B-, 6 = 2.00 / C, 5.9-0 = 0.00 / F
The academic year is comprised of tetramestres / 4-month terms; transfer policies are liberal
gradingInfo: The grade scale is based on 5 to10 with 6 as passing: 9-10 = 4.00 / A, 8 = 3.33 / B +, 7 = 2.67 / B-, 6 = 2.00 / C, 5.9-0 = 0.00 / F

gradingInfo: Previously, the grade was based on 10 with 7 as passing: 9-10 = 4.00/A, 8-8.9 = 3.00/B, 7-7.9 = 2.00/C, and below 7 = 0.00/F. Graduate programs consider a grade of 80 as passing.

credentialName: Centro Regional de Enseanza Tcnica Industrial (CeRETI)
issuingBody: Organismo Pblico Descentralizado Federal / Decentralized Public Federal Institution (as CETI)
notes: Created in 1966, the Centro Regional de Enseanza Tcnica Industrial (CeRETI), Guadalajara, Jalisco State, began offering technical education, leading to the designation of tcnico / technician (in construction, electrical engineering, electronics, and mechanics) based on a UNESCO educational model.
In 1971, the Tcnico Laboratorista Qumico en Celulosa y Papel / Chemical Laborabory Technician in Paper and Cellulose was added.
In 1977-76, the term Tcnico / Technician was changed to Tecnlogo / Technologist, distinguishing between general secondary and upper-secondary education.
In 1978, tertiary level degrees in industrial engineering were added with majors in instrumentation and process control, mechanics, and paper and pulp.

In 1983, the CeNETI CeRETI system was dissolved; the former center in Jalisco became the Centro de Enseanza Tcnica Industrial (CETI) ./ Center for Industrial Technical Education as an Organismo Pblico Descentralizado Federal / Decentralized Public Federal Institution.
gradingInfo: The grade scale is based on 100, with 70 as the minimum passing grade: 90-100 = 4.00/A, 80-89 = 3.00/B, 70-79 = 2.00/C, and below 70 = 0.00/F.

In 1971, the Tcnico Laboratorista Qumico en Celulosa y Papel / Chemical Laborabory Technician in Paper and Cellulose was added.
In 1977-76, the term Tcnico / Technician was changed to Tecnlogo / Technologist, distinguishing between general secondary and upper-secondary education.
In 1978, tertiary level degrees in industrial engineering were added with majors in instrumentation and process control, mechanics, and paper and pulp.

In 1983, the CeNETI CeRETI system was dissolved; the former center in Jalisco became the Centro de Enseanza Tcnica Industrial (CETI) ./ Center for Industrial Technical Education as an Organismo Pblico Descentralizado Federal / Decentralized Public Federal Institution.
gradingInfo: The grade scale is based on 100, with 70 as the minimum passing grade: 90-100 = 4.00/A, 80-89 = 3.00/B, 70-79 = 2.00/C, and below 70 = 0.00/F.

issuingBody: General Directorate of Normal Education within the Secretariat of Public Education
notes: From Escuela Normal Urbana Federal Cuauhtmoc

Escuela Normal Urbana Preescolar Cuauhtmoc was a bona fide state institution of teacher training with validez oficial / accreditation through the General Directorate of Normal Education within the Secretariat of Public Education.

Since the implementation of the 1984 reform, Cuauhtmoc Federal Urban Teacher Training School is authorized to teach programs of study leading to the Licenciatura en Educacin Preescolar / Licentiate in Preschool Education and Licenciatura en Educacin Primaria / Licentiate in Primary Education.

notes: The history of The Anglo Mexican Foundation dates back to 1943 with the creation of the INSTITUTO ANGLO MEXICANO DE CULTURA, the objective being to strengthen ties between Great Britain and Mexico through on-going cultural exchange.

It is a private, non-university, non-degree granting academy of language and culture / civilization for teaching of the English language, the training of English teachers and the organization of a wide range of cultural events.
In 2003, the Institute changed its name to The Anglo Mexican Foundation in order to reflect the wide range of activities which the organization seeks to achieve in this new century.

credentialName: Escena Escuela de Animacin y Arte Digital
englishName: (Escena School of Animation and Digital Art)
notes: Private HEI with programs recognized by SEP.
Program recognition needs to be checked on a case-by-case basis.
It currently (2025) has 2 recognized programs beginning from 2018-2022 with 2 program formats each, all licenciaturas:
Modelado y Animacion 3D (Escolarizado, Mixto)
Ilustracion (Escolarizado, Mixto)
Institution has existed since 2010, possibly under different names.
Past programs should be checked on a case-by-case basis.
https://escena.edu.mx/
See RVOE excel on 002098745
